Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Stephen:

Text.Language: <ere Ctevanoc: pisorp m~marturoc: ,ere piar,idiakwn: ouoh t~c~marwout.
Hail to Stephen the first martyr, Hail to the holy archdeacon, and the blessed.
